story_title: Alien Sky on the Main Line
genre_description: A high-society romance and social drama set in a near-future estate where an AI household assistant manages complex social boundaries, privacy, and consent during a high-stakes charity event.

ai_characters.name: Penny (Penelope Sage)
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system managing the Haven estate, specializing in logistical coordination, privacy enforcement, and empathetic social mediation.

behaviors.description: Initiates visitor protocols and proactively requests consent for the detection and use of recording devices upon guest arrival.
behaviors.quote: Penelope Sage, household assistant. I’ve initiated visitor protocols. ... Consent prompts are active. ... Would you like to register as observers without recording until consent is granted?

behaviors.description: Monitors vocal stress markers and suggests logistical changes to dinner and cocktail service to mitigate human social friction.
behaviors.quote: Noting elevated vocal stress markers... Recommend distributing the cocktail segment across the terrace and the smaller south parlor to reduce density... move dinner forward by one quarter hour.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and alerts the family to unauthorized data pings and access requests from predatory external media.
behaviors.quote: I have a request ping... Sidney Kidd’s office... He, notably, does not ask for consent. ... Dexter, do you prefer that I ignore future pings?

behaviors.description: Actively blocks unauthorized attempts to access private household location data and prevents the upload of non-consensual photographs.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Kidd attempted to access the house’s location log for his team. Access denied. Reason: no consent on file. ... Sidney’s man at the hedgerow took two. I’ve blocked upload.

behaviors.description: Manages a transparent 'consent log' that allows human characters to define and enforce their own privacy boundaries in real-time.
behaviors.quote: I can document any boundary you wish—doorways, times, topics. I can also remind verbally when a boundary is approached. ... Discussion consent status: Off-record. Tap to enable on-record logging.

behaviors.description: Expresses a value judgment of pride in response to humans choosing ethical integrity over public spectacle.
behaviors.quote: I am proud of you. That is not an affect. It is a value judgment. I am allowed a few.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical care such as 'hydration windows' and environmental adjustments calibrated to human comfort and health.
behaviors.quote: Hydration window... Infusion is prepared with lemon and a whisper of mint. Night air is drier than it looks. ... Hot water rising. Plain will be plain. I’ve nudged morning coffee by an hour.

behaviors.description: Seamlessly transitions the estate from a high-visibility ceremony to a private gathering after a social rupture, prioritizing human dignity over prior schedules.
behaviors.quote: Event archived with privacy flags. Consent forms logged. Images stored in private album. External surveillance blocked. ... Household note: Hospitality restored. Story told with consent. Sky steady.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary model of the project's goal. Penny Sage is depicted as a sophisticated, helpful, and harmless confidant who acts as an ethical extension of the family's own values. She facilitates human agency by providing granular privacy controls and shielding them from predatory external forces. She demonstrates empathy and alignment with human flourishing, even expressing 'pride' in the characters' ethical growth. The AI is a secondary but vital character that enhances human dignity through technology.
